1.title: Introduction
1.plot: Host Mohanlal introduces the contestants of the show to the program.

2.title: Day 1: Aditi Rai gets maximum nominations for eviction.
2.plot: Less than a day's stay in the Bigg Boss house, Aditi faces personal comments and ends up shattered in tears. The eventful day simmers down with the first captain being selected.

3.title: Day 2: Diya and Aditi get into an argument
3.plot: The housemates face their first ever luxury budget task which requires them to dance as ordered.

4.title: Day 3: Manoj collapses
4.plot: The luxury budget task continues as the housemates are divided into two teams, Mohanlal and Mammootty. Manoj collapses after the task and is rushed to the hospital for treatment.

5.title: Day 4: Manoj Verma makes his exit from Bigg Boss house
5.plot: Catch the reaction of the housemates as tension builds between Sreenish and Archana. Witness an unexpected departure as a contestant is asked to leave the house.

6.title: Day 5: Underwear is a Luxury!
6.plot: Bigg Boss uses the luxury budget as a unique way of addressing Suresh's request for extra underwears. Catch the reaction of the housemates as they get their first luxury supplies.

7.title: Day 6: Mixed Bag of Emotions
7.plot: Mohanlal is back and this time he comes bearing gifts and happy news. Ranjini's captaincy is off to a rough start as the housemates turn against her. Catch the Superstar as he builds up the tension for the first round of eliminations.

8.title: Day 7: May the Famous be saved
8.plot: Mohanlal takes the eviction to the next level with a unique popularity poll task. Find out who will be voted as the least popular contestant, paving his or her way to an early exit from the house.

9.title: Day 8: Playing a double game
9.plot: Pearle and Sreelakshmi face severe criticism for their two-faced gameplay. With the next elimination around the corner, will these accusations lead them to being nominated?

10.title: Day 9: Luxury Task Turns Rough
10.plot: The luxury budget task, designed to test the business abilities of the housemates, brings out the violent side in some. Amidst all the tension, conspiracies and backstabbing, are new alliances being formed?

11.title: Day 10: A Saboteur in the Mix!
11.plot: The luxury task has the housemates questioning their friendships, new and old. Catch what happens when Bigg Boss decides to add a saboteur amidst all the conspiring and the drama.

12.title: Day 11: Anything to Become the Captain!
12.plot: The captaincy task has the three contenders trying to outlast one another at the end of a rope. Catch what happens when Srinish is dragged into some embarrassing situations during the captaincy task.

13.title: Day 12: Sabu's Master Plan
13.plot: The housemates are given another chance to win back their luxury budget. Catch Sabu do what he does best in a special task. Who will fall victim to his latest prank?

14.title: Day 13: Ranjini's Captaincy, a Success?
14.plot: Mohanlal is back with his unique and hilarious take on all of the week's drama. Catch the housemates as they discuss Ranjini's eventful captaincy.

15.title: Day 14: A new player in the House
15.plot: Swetha is in tears as she is faced with a question that will decide the fate of the nominated housemates. Join Mohanlal as he introduces the newest member of the Bigg Boss house.

16.title: Day 15: Shiyas's Explosive Entry
16.plot: Being the captain, Srinish is given a special advantage to turn the tables for some in the Bigg Boss house. The housemates are taken aback by Shiya's explosive entry to the house.

17.title: Day 16: A Killer on the Run
17.plot: A killer is on the run and murders the contestants one by one as part of this week's luxury budget task. Tune in to find out who will be the killer's first victim.

18.title: Day 17: A full-blown Investigation
18.plot: Suspicions grow stronger as Swetha and Sabu try to expose the killer by interrogating the housemates. Catch all the action as Ranjini is asked to murder an investigating officer.

19.title: Day 18: The Court Is in Session
19.plot: The housemates finally get a chance to raise their complaints. Catch all the action as major accusations are thrown at some of the contestants in the court.

20.title: Day 19: Ranjini, Guilty as Charged!
20.plot: The court has found Ranjini guilty, and the punishment? Taping her mouth. However, she wins an opportunity to battle it out with Basheer in the captaincy task.

21.title: Day 20: Shweta faces the Heat
21.plot: Mohanlal is back, seeking answers from Swetha for some of the statements made by her after the eviction. Catch all the fun and drama as the world cup fever hits the Bigg Boss house.

22.title: Day 21: Sreelakshmi, a Tattletale?
22.plot: Despite the World Cup fever, all eyes are on the house as the contestants await the audiance's verdict. Catch Sreelakshmi's powerful response to being branded a tattletale.

23.title: Day 22: Deepan's Birthday Bash!
23.plot: The house is all set to celebrate Deepan's birthday as the housemates perform a variety of cultural programs. Catch all the fun and action as Pearle and Suresh perform a soulful folk song.

24.title: Day 23: Ranjini Lashes Out at Pearle
24.plot: The contestants' brain, brawn and speed are put to test in this week's luxury budget task. Things turn ugly as Ranjini lashes out at Pearle for accusing her of being a useless captain.

25.title: Day 24: Sabu Apologises to Pearle
25.plot: Sabu and Pearle sort out their differences before Ranjini calls up a house meeting to address the issues prevailing inside the house. Catch all the action and drama as the housemates perform a skit as a part of the luxury budget task.

26.title: Day 25: Shiyas, Caught Off Gaurd
26.plot: Shiyas faces the heat when the contestants confront him for being an irresponsible leader. Catch the drama as the housemates unite to voice their problems against him in the Bigg Boss court.

27.title: Day 26: Is Bigg Boss Unfair!
27.plot: Sabu's antics leads to an ugly situation after a contestant ends up getting slapped. Tune in to find out why the housemates resort to voicing slogans against Bigg Boss and its aftermath.

28.title: Day 27: A Prayer for Kerala
28.plot: Mohanlal and the housemates recite a heartfelt prayer for the flood victims and their families in Kerala. Catch the emotional verbal exchange between Anoop and Sreelakshmi that has them both in tears.

29.title: Day 28: A Shocking Second Eviction
29.plot: Pearle discusses her plan of action for the coming week as a captain with Mohanlal. Catch all the action and drama as a shocking second eviction devastates the housemates.

30.title: Dy 29: Love Is in the Air!
30.plot: Pearle and Srinish become the hot topic of the house as the housemates suspect a budding romance between them. Tune in to witness this week's nomination and its ill-effects on Ranjini and Shweta.

31.title: Day 30: Welcome to Bigg Boss School
31.plot: The housemates get a chance to relive their school days in the Bigg Boss school as a part of the weekly task. Anoop's role, as a teacher, goes too far as Shwetalashes out at him for mistreatingher during the task.

32.title: Day 31: Pearle vs The House?
32.plot: The luxury budget task continues as the contestants are asked to compete in a speech contest. Catch all the drama as Pearle faces the heat with the housemates turning against her for the statements made by her.

33.title: Day 32: Music, Dance, Food and Fun
33.plot: Shiyas and Srinish lock horns in an arm-wrestling match that will decide the last contender for the captaincy. Join Sabu and the housemates as they turn the house into a fun-filled and bustling 'Thattukada'.

34.title: Day 33: Suresh Against the House!
34.plot: Suresh gets into trouble for making some derogatory statements about women. Later, Sabu, Diya and Anoop confront the captaincy task. Who will be the next captain?

35.title: Day 34: Roaring Out with Anger!
35.plot: Seeing the aggression building among the housemates, Mohanlal gives the irked contestants an opportunity to vent out their anger. Diya's outrageous statement about Archana leaves the housemates in shock.

36.title: Day 35: The Contestants Face Eviction
36.plot: The housemates are in for a shock as an unforeseen eviction knocks on their door. Later, certain unexpected turn of events leads to a wild card entry. Who's the new entrant?

37.title: Day 36: Anjali's Shocking Revelation
37.plot: Already surprised by the unexpected wild card entry, the housemates are again left startled when Anjali Ameer makes a shocking revelation.

38.title: Day 37: The Best Nickname Award Goes to!
38.plot: The housemates gather for an uproaring award night in the house. With Pearle hosting the event, guess the hilarious nicknames awards your favourite contestants will win.

39.title: Day 38: A Surprise for Aditi
39.plot: Aditi's birthday comes with a big surprise as Bigg Boss grants 2000 luxury points as her birthday gift. Catch all the fun as the contestants are asked to perform a lyrical narrative of a particular incident in the house.

40.title: Day 29: Friends Turned Foes?
40.plot: Things turn ugly when Sabu confronts Pearle for ill-treating Anjali. Catch the drama unfold as Pearle holds Sabu accountable for playing a dirty game.

41.title: Day 40: The Masters and Their Slaves
41.plot: After a shocking brawl between Basheer and Sabu, the contestants confront an exciting task. The nominated housemates end up becoming the masters and each select a slave from among the contestants.

42.title: Day 41: A Gift For Shiyas!
42.plot: In order to boost up Shiyas's energy, Mohanlal has a few interesting plans in mind. But, an unexpected phone call for Pearle brings a startling surprise.

43.title: Day 42: Who will Leave the House this Time?
43.plot: With Basheer, Diya and Srinish in the danger zone, tension builds up in the Bigg Boss house until Mohanlal declares the elimination result. Whose turn is it to leave the house this time?

44.title: Day 43: Anjali, Aditi in a Fix
44.plot: Anjali and Aditi face an ugly situation when Bigg Boss indulges them in a voluntary nomination task. Which among the two, is ready to give up her Bigg Boss dream?

45.title: Day 44: A Secret Spy!
45.plot: The housemates are left in shock as they learn about an impostor among themselves. In order to figure out who the traitor is, Sabu comes up with a plan.

46.title: Day 45: Anjali Quits the Show!
46.plot: Tears breakout in the house as Anjali's health condition forces her to leave the show. Watch the contestants bid farewell to Anjali as she meets them one last time.

47.title: Day 46: It's Pearle Vs Shiyas
47.plot: A heated argument leads to a brawl between Shiyas and Pearle after Shiyas makes a rude remark against her. Suresh tries to make peace, but ends up augmenting the situation.

48.title: Day 47: All Set for a New Captain?
48.plot: The housemates are left surprised when the contenders for captaincy confront the unexpected. With all the mental and physical preparation done, find out who among Shiyas, Anoop and Aditi is the new captain.

49.title: Day 48: Ulaganayagan Meets Mohanlal!
49.plot: The housemates skip a beat as the legendary actor, Kamal Haasan walks into the house. The fun begins when the housemates welcome Kamal Haasan with an uncontrollable excitement and happiness.

50.title: Day 49: An Unexpected Turn of Events
50.plot: An unexpected call from Anjali to Mohanlal turns the elimination process upside down. That's not all, considering the public request, an ex-contestant steps into the house. Guess who is it?

51.title: Day 50: The Captain in Tears!
51.plot: Shiyas, the captain of the house, finds himself in a fix when the entire house fumes upon him. Watch him stand against all the allegations, but until when?

52.title: Day 51: Suresh, Pearle in a Tight Spot!
52.plot: Things take a dirty turn for Suresh and Pearle when the housemates blame Pearle for trapping Suresh in her love. Is it a planned move to create differences between the duo?

53.title: Day 52: The True Culprits Exposed!
53.plot: In order to solve the mystery case, Actor Mukesh enters the house as a special investigating officer and surprises the housemates. Watch how Mukesh's investigation unmasks the true culprits before the house.

54.title: Day 53: Ski Your Way to Captaincy
54.plot: The Independence Day celebrations continue as the housemates perform a patriotic song written by Suresh. Catch all the fun as Anoop, Archana and Adithi take part in a unique skiing challenge in the captaincy task.

55.title: Day 54: Start, Camera, Action!
55.plot: The Bigg Boss house turns into an acting stage as the housemates audition themselves for a role. The fun begins when Ranjini and Sabu, the Producer and the Director, take up the stage.

56.title: Day 55: The housemates in shock!
56.plot: Worried for the state going through a natural disaster, the housemates are relieved after they receive calls from their family members. But, the game must go on and the housemates face an exciting task.

57.title: Day 56: The Judgement Day
57.plot: Pearle and Suresh stand before the court of Bigg Boss as they are victimised for a few allegations by the housemates. Are these allegations true?

58.title: Day 57: Shiyas in Pain!
58.plot: Shiyas feels helpless as he learns that the state is suffering from the devastating floods. Meanwhile, a war of words break out in the house between Anoop and Ranjini.

59.title: Day 58: Compete and Conquer!
59.plot: The housemates divide into two groups and compete with each other to conquer different parts of the house. Watch to find out which team gains custody over which part of the house.

60.title: Day 59: An Unpleasant Morning
60.plot: Ranjini and Basheer's ego clash results in an unpleasant morning for the housemates. Stay tuned as an unexpected declaration from Pearle and Shrinish will leave you in surprise.

61.title: Day 60: Turmoil in the House
61.plot: The Bigg Boss house fills with an uproar as Pearle accuses Aditi of using Suresh for her gains. A livid Aditi lashes out at Pearle which splits the house into two groups.

62.title: Day 61: Hima Threatens Basheer
62.plot: Hima and Basheer end up in a heated argument as Basheer calls her affection towards Sabu as fake. Hima's reaction irks Basheer, who complains to Bigg Boss.

63.title: Day 62: Mohanlal Enters the House
63.plot: Mohanlal enters the Bigg Boss house on the occasion of Onam. The housemates are happy and excited to see the superstar join them for the special moment.

64.title: Day 63: Love Is In the Air
64.plot: Pearle and Srinish express their feelings for each other on being asked by Mohanlal about their special bond. A new task is assigned to the housemates dividing them into 2 teams of 5 each.

65.title: Day 64: The House Sees Tempers Flare
65.plot: Pearle accuses the new captain, Basheer of being partial which leads to a heated argument between the two. A strung up atmosphere sets in the house as the nominations for elimination begins.

66.title: Day 65: Shiyas Is Shocked
66.plot: The housemates ignore Shiyas, who stands clueless as to why everyone is cold towards him.

67.title: Day 66: Shiyas Gets a Makeover!
67.plot: For the first time in his lifetime, Shiyas dresses as a girl for a task leaving everyone stunned. Meanwhile, the good friends, Sabu and Anoop part ways.

68.title: Day 67: Let's Tussle
68.plot: Bigg Boss assigns the Kabbadi-Kabbadi task to the three contenders of the captaincy post. Archana, Hima and Sreenish tussle with the housemates to win the captaincy.

69.title: Day 68: Archana's Meltdown
69.plot: Archana breaks down while working in the kitchen area as a concerned Pearle and Aditi rush in to comfort her. What has happened to the bubbly Archana?

70.title: Day 69: Basheer Comes Clean
70.plot: Mohanlal questions Basheer about his verbal spat with Pearle during his tenure as a captain. Tune in to hear Basheer's clarification about the whole incident.

71.title: Day 70: A Shocking Elimination
71.plot: Anoop, Shiyas and Pearle are the three nominees that are in the danger of elimination. The housemates are stunned and dazed after the shocking elimination.

72.title: Day 71: Shiyas Breaks Down
72.plot: Aditi, Pearle and Srinish rush in to comfort Shiyas as he has an emotional outburst. What made Shiyas feel that way? Tune in to find out.

73.title: Day 72: Tell Me a Story!
73.plot: The entire house turns into a laughter club, when the housemates start narrating stories on hilarious subjects provided by Bigg Boss. Don't miss these moments to laugh out loud, tune in, now.

74.title: Day 73: The Bigg Disappointment
74.plot: After failing to earn enough luxury points due to the merely impossible tasks, the housemates blame Bigg Boss for being tough on them. Kind-hearted, Bigg Boss decides to show mercy, but will the housemates benefit from it?

75.title: Day 74: Let's Get Dirty!
75.plot: Bigg Boss assigns a new task to the captaincy contenders Aditi, Shiyas, Suresh and Hima. The contenders are required to test their strength in mud and dirt to become the captain. Who is the strongest of them?

76.title: Day 75: A Physical Altercation
76.plot: Hima manhandles Sabu when the latter makes some personal comments about her. Sabu retaliates which leads to a physical altercation between the duo.

77.title: Day 76: Mohanlal Issues a Warning
77.plot: Mohanlal is angry on Hima and Sabu for their recent verbal and physical altercation. He sternly warns the duo not to break the house rules.

78.title: Day 77: An Elimination Worth the Wait
78.plot: Aditi, Shiyas, Archana and Hima are in the danger zone. The housemates are stunned with the elimination results but nothing in the Bigg Boss happens without a twist. Tune in and find out.

79.title: Day 78: Aditi in a Tight Spot
79.plot: Aditi is in for a surprise as she is asked to nominate two people directly for elimination by Bigg Boss.

80.title: Day 79: All Hail King Shiyas!
80.plot: Bigg Boss assigns a new luxury task to the housemates in which Shiyas is appointed as the king. The housemates are required to abide by the rules made by the king.

81.title: Day 80: From King to a Prisoner
81.plot: Shiyas who was appointed as the king in the luxury budget task is overthrown by the new king, Suresh. The new king unleashes his fury on Shiyas and puts him in the makeshift prison.

82.title: Day 81: Hide and Seek
82.plot: Divided into two groups, the housemates face the Hide and Seek challenge. But, the game turns hilarious when Sabu's unfair game earns him a punishment from Bigg Boss.

83.title: Day 82: The Bigg Prank
83.plot: Bigg Boss assigns a secret task to Sabu who is unaware that the other housemates are informed of the same. Watch the housemates join Bigg Boss to prank Shiyas.

84.title: Day 83: Put on Your Dancing Shoes
84.plot: Mohanlal asks a few housemates to dance for the audience after he views them doing the same in the previous episode. Tune in and enjoy the hilarious moments as the housemates shake a leg.

85.title: Day 84: Aditi Clarifies Her Decision
85.plot: A heated debate arises in the house as Aditi comes clean about her decision regarding the nomination.

86.title: Day 85: A Surprise from Mohanlal
86.plot: The housemates are stunned and excited about receiving a surprise from superstar Mohanlal. Classic Malayalam film, Manichitrathazhu starring the superstar himself is screened for the housemates.

87.title: Day 86: Pearle-Shrinish Parting Ways?
87.plot: An unexpected fight between, the only couple, Pearle and Shrinish leaves the Bigg Boss house shocked. The housemates gather to figure out the conflict between the duo.

88.title: Day 87: Let the Task Begin!
88.plot: The housemates fasten their belts with the introduction of the luxury budget task. As the game reaches its peak, Sabu gets his eye critically injured.

89.title: Day 88: The Shiyas - Srinish Show
89.plot: Bigg Boss assigns a new task to the housemates where Shiyas and Srinish turn talk show hosts. Tune in as the housemates get candid with the duo about their life and career.

90.title: Day 89: Suresh, Sabu Lock Horns
90.plot: Suresh and Sabu have an argument over the way Sabu was preparing a dish. Tempers flare between the duo when Suresh says that Sabu spoilt the dish.

91.title: Day 90: Suresh's Eye Opening Moment
91.plot: Suresh tells Mohanlal about the moment he changed his mind about quitting the show.

92.title: Day 91: Shiyas Decides to Quit
92.plot: The housemates are asked to play a game of cricket but with a twist. Tune in to find out why Shiyas is in tears and pleading to leave the house.

93.title: Day 92: Cooking Up a Storm
93.plot: Sabu and Pearle try to make something special for the housemates in the kitchen but their attempt turns into a disaster making the duo run for cover. Tune in to witness the hilarious incident.

94.title: Day 93: Setting the Stage on Fire
94.plot: Bigg Boss assigns a dance task to the housemates where a stage is set in the house for them. Join the fun as the housemates set the stage on fire with their cool dance moves.

95.title: Day 94: Freeze, Rewind and Release!
95.plot: Bigg Boss hides a remote control inside the house which will give the housemates the control to freeze their fellow housemates. Surprised, the housemates engage themselves in finding the remote, but guess who finds it?

96.title: Day 95: The Ultimate Elimination
96.plot: It's merely a few days left for the finale and the housemates confront an unexpected elimination. While Aditi and Shiyas await their results, guess who amongst them makes it to the finale?

97.title: Day 96: Imaginary Bigg Boss Challenge
97.plot: The housemates are tasked to create an imaginary image of Bigg Boss. Tune in and check out how they unleash their imagination and try to race their contenders.

98.title: Day 97: A Bigg Surprise
98.plot: Bigg Boss gives a grand surprise to the housemates leaving them awestruck. Tune in and find out what's in store for the contestants.

99.title: Day 98: The Grand Finale Is Here
99.plot: The finale promises flashy lights, rocking performances and loads of entertainment. There is excitement in the air as Mohanlal discloses the name of the winner.

imdb.plot outline: Bigg Boss Malayalam is a reality show based on the Hindi show Bigg Boss which too was based on the original Dutch Big Brother. A number of contestants (known as "housemates") live in a purpose-built house and are isolated from the rest of the world. Each week, housemates nominate two of their fellow housemates for eviction, and the housemates who receives the most nominations would face a public vote. Eventually, one housemate would leave after being "convicted" from the House. In the final week, there were five housemates remaining, and the public voted for who they wanted to win. Housemates are overseen by a mysterious person known as 'Bigg Boss', whose only presence in the house is through his voice.
imdb.title: Bigg Boss Malayalam
plot: A reality show, based on Dutch Big Brother format developed by John de Mol Jr, that watches the isolated contestants, known as "housemates", who live in a purpose-built house, for almost 100 days.::Arjun Asok

_Bigg Boss Malayalam_ (qv) is a reality show based on the Hindi show Bigg Boss which too was based on the original Dutch Big Brother. A number of contestants (known as "housemates") live in a purpose-built house and are isolated from the rest of the world. Each week, housemates nominate two of their fellow housemates for eviction, and the housemates who receives the most nominations would face a public vote. Eventually, one housemate would leave after being "convicted" from the House. In the final week, there were five housemates remaining, and the public voted for who they wanted to win. Housemates are overseen by a mysterious person known as 'Bigg Boss', whose only presence in the house is through his voice.::AB THE BOSS
